product_name: Patagonia Torrentshell Stretch Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: The women's Torrentshell Stretch jacket from Patagonia is a fully-featured rain jacket offering generous stretch throughout the arms and shoulders for mobility and protection in seriously wet weather. When weather threatens to dampen your psyche, the Torrentshell Stretch jacket can swing the balance back to the pleasure zone with full waterproof, breathable protection. 2.5-layer ripstop nylon fabric stays durable, while underarm gussets and stretch panels in the lower arms and across the back of the shoulders enhance mobility. Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood with laminated visor rolls down and stows. Watertight, coated center-front zipper with internal stormflap; microfleece-lined neck is skin-friendly. Venting pit zips with watertight, coated 2-way zippers. Drawcord hem and self-fabric rip-and-stick cuff closures seal in heat. Zippered handwarmer pockets and a left chest pocket all have watertight, coated zippers and zipper garages. Gusseted underarm panels let you reach without raising the jacket hem. Patagonia Torrentshell jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: The women's Torrentshell Stretch jacket from Patagonia is a fully-featured rain jacket offering generous stretch throughout the arms and shoulders for mobility and protection in seriously wet weather.
